ygData.subject: RE: lambent quest-ion...hehehe
ygData.msgSnippet: They have actually fixed many of the quests to work both ways now.  The bone chip quest in Kaladim allows you to give 4 stacks of 4 chips each and get paid 4
ygData.messageBody:
They have actually fixed many of the quests to work both ways now. The bone
chip quest in Kaladim allows you to give 4 stacks of 4 chips each and get
paid 4 times at once, a great time saver on those bonechip backpack runs
from Kelethin. ;)

Kitasi

PS I would never count on it on items of worth though, better safe than
sorry

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 11:04 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] lambent quest-ion...hehehe


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

tsk tsk tsk - too much hack and slash? level 40 and you are asking some
newbie quest skill questions <just kidding>

NEVER EVER give quest items stacked!!!

Quest wants 2 star rubies and a lambent stone? fill 3 slots in the trade
window: ruby, ruby, stone

Now I would not put it past Verant to do something really evil and break
this simple quest rule just to get everyone fuming mad. But all other
quests I have done - DO NOT STACK ITEMS! Use separate slots.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 32th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Kevikazzam@... [mailto:Kevikazzam@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 11:00 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] lambent quest-ion...hehehe

From: Kevikazzam@...

Hail !

My question regards getting the product of a lambent stone
and a gem. For
example if i want a Lambent star ruby i must give the NPC (
can't recall the
name ) 2 star ruby's and a lambent stone. So my question is
, do i give the
rubies to him/her stacked ( only taking up 1 trade box ) or
seperate ( using
2) ? Or does it even matter ? I just really have zero
interest in screwing
this up , any and all opinions are welcome .

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 40 bard of Tunare--
